name: Magmortar
description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

attacks.name: Hard Crush
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Mantle Bazooka
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.
